permafrost.tundra.lang

Class ThreadHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.ThreadHelper

  • public class ThreadHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Thread objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Thread getCurrentThread()
      Returns the currently executing thread.
      static com.wm.data.IData getCurrentThreadAsIData()
      Returns the currently executing thread in an IData representation.
      static java.lang.ThreadGroup getRootThreadGroup()
      Returns the root thread group.
      static java.lang.Thread[] listThreads()
      Returns a list of all the threads in the current context.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] listThreadsAsIDataArray()
      Returns a list of all threads in the current context in an IData[] representation.
      static com.wm.data.IData toIData(java.lang.Thread thread)
      Converts a Thread object to an IData representation.
      static com.wm.data.IData[] toIDataArray(java.lang.Thread[] array)
      Converts the given Thread[] to an IData[] representation.
